Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for a specific State of a Connect4 game
    Version:
    (2/11/2018)
    Author:
    (Sam Saxon)

      • State

        public State()
        Default constructor for objects of class State. 'X' is default player

      • State

        public State(State old)
        Copy constructor for objects of class State.

                     int depth,
                     int alpha,

                     int maxDepth)

      • getAvailable

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getAvailable()
        Returns an ArrayList of the valid moves of this state (column is not full)
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containting indexes of non-empty columns

      • getBestMove

        public int getBestMove(char player,
                       int difficulty)
        Uses the minimax function to calculate the best move for a player
        Parameters:
        player - the player to get the best move for. MUST be either 'O' or 'X'
        difficulty - the difficulty of the game, higher difficulty returns a better move. should never be higher than 8
        Returns:
        the column number representing the best move for the given player

      • getBoard

        public char[][] getBoard()
        gets the State's board
        Returns:
        the current State's board

      • getMoveString

        public java.lang.String getMoveString()

      • getPlayerTurn

        public char getPlayerTurn()
        gets the current players turn
        Returns:
        the current player's turn

      • getWinningIndex

        public int[] getWinningIndex()
        gets the winning index of the board (null if neither player has won)
        Returns:
        the winningIndex of the game (null if game is not over)

      • hasEnded

        public boolean hasEnded()
        Returns true if the game is over (either player has 4 in a row or the board is full)
        Returns:
        true if the game is over, false otherwise

      • negamax

        public int negamax(State s,
                   int depth,
                   int alpha,
                   int beta,
                   int player,
                   int maxDepth)

      • place

        public State place(int col)
        Places a piece in a column, swaps the player turn and returns the new State
        Parameters:
        col - the column to place the piece in. must be from [0,6]
        Returns:
        a copy of the old State with the piece placed in the column

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard()
        Prints the game board of this State to the console

      • score

        public int score()
        Calculates the heuristic score of this State. Higher score is better for player X, lower score is better for player O
        Returns:
        the score of the state

      • swapTurn

        public void swapTurn()
        changes the turn of the current player (O becomes X or X becomes O)

      • template

        public static State template(java.lang.String moveString)
